content:
# The stone furnace has been successfully placed, and I have inserted coal into it as fuel. However, the furnace is currently reporting "no ingredients to smelt," which means I need to provide it with an input resource to start processing.

# Since I have coal, I can either gather iron ore to smelt into iron plates or gather more coal for additional fuel. 
# I will prioritize gathering iron ore so I can start producing iron plates.

# Let's locate the nearest iron ore patch and gather some iron ore.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore resource patch.
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore patch for harvesting.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Gather 10 iron ore for smelting.
print(f"Inventory after gathering iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
